thread.title: Emmerdale sweeps up at Inside Soap Awards
thread.title_full: Emmerdale sweeps up at Inside Soap Awards | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Emmerdale sweeps up at Inside Soap Awards
text:
Emmerdale took home more awards than any other at this year's Inside Soap awards.
The ITV show took home eight of the 18 awards, including Best Soap - only the second time it has done so in the awards' 20-year history.
A picture tweeted by the Emmerdale crew after last night's ceremony Credit: Emmerdale The cast and crew kept us updated throughout the night as they collected their gongs:
Emmerdale @emmerdale Follow The Bartons are one incredibly good looking family - check them out on the @ insidesoapmag carpet #Emmerdale http://t.co/G3UwhNvALA
19:39 - 5 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Emmerdale @emmerdale Follow The moment Charlie Hardwick and Chris Chittell won Best Partnership at @ insidesoapmag awards! #Emmerdale http://t.co/p0tUbYcNCw
21:13 - 5 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite The full list is as follows:
Best soap - Emmerdale Best actor - Michael Parr (Ross Barton, Emmerdale) Best actress - Alison King (Carla Connor, Coronation Street) Best bad boy - Michael Parr (Ross Barton, Emmerdale) Best bad girl - Kate Ford (Tracy Barlow, Coronation Street) Funniest male - Joe Duttine (Tim Metcalfe,Coronation Street) Funniest female - Tameka Empson (Kim Fox-Hubbard, EastEnders) Best newcomer - Ryan Hawley (Robert Sugden, Emmerdale) Best young actor - Amelia Flanagan (April Windsor, Emmerdale) Sexiest male - Michael Parr (Ross Barton, Emmerdale) Sexiest female - Jennifer Metcalfe (Mercedes McQueen, Hollyoaks) Best shock twist - Bobby killed Lucy (EastEnders) Best affair - Debbie Dingle & Ross Barton (Emmerdale) Best partnership - Charlie Hardwick & Chris Chittell (Val & Eric Pollard, Emmerdale) Best partnership - Charlie Hardwick & Chris Chittell (Val & Eric Pollard, Emmerdale) Best show-stopper - The live episode (EastEnders) Best daytime star - Jackie Woodburne (Susan Kennedy, Neighbours) Best daytime soap - Neighbours Best drama - Casualty Last updated Tue 6 Oct 2015 Entertainment Hull Sheffield
